brand_color_description: Brand color for major navigational elements
brand_text_color_description: Brand color for hover and active states
text_color_description: Text color for body and heading elements
visited_link_color_description: Text color for visited link elements
background_color_description: Background color of your help center
theme_border_color_description: Theme border color for your help center
avatar_bg_color_description: Update the value to change the background-color of user agent icon background-color
agent_color_description: Update the value to change the color of agent-icon
logo_link_desc: By default the logo is linked to the help-center homepage, and this setting allows you to link the logo to a custom url
logo_link_visibility_desc: Update the value to change the redirection of logo into a custom URL
logo_link_description: By default the logo is linked to the help-center homepage, and this setting allows you to link the logo to a custom url
favicon_description: Icon displayed in the address bar of your browser
error_image_description: Error image on the error page
homepage_background_image_description: Hero image on the home page
community_background_image_description: Hero image on the community topics page
community_image_description: Image for the community section on the home page
minimal_header_description: Update the value to show the minimal header
header_background_color_description: Update the value to change the background-color of header
header_text_color_description: Update the value to change the header text-color
header_com_text_desc: Update the value to change the text of community link or type NONE to show default text
header_community_text_desc_dc: Add placeholder name for Dynamic Content (DC) e.g. from {{dc.dz_community_link_text}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_community_link_text', or enter NONE (for no DC)
header_submit_req_text_desc: Update the value to change the text of  submit request link or type NONE to show default text
submit_req_text_text_desc_dc: Add placeholder name for Dynamic Content (DC) e.g. from {{dc.dz_submit_request_link_text}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_submit_request_link_text', or enter NONE (for no DC)
sign_in_button_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of Sign in Button
minimal_footer_description: Update the value to show the minimal footer
footer_background_color_description: Update the value to change background-color of footer
footer_text_color_description: Update the value to change the color of footer text
welcome_message_description_label: Update the value to change the welcome message title or simply set NONE to hide the welcome message title
welcome_message_description: Update the value to change the welcome message or simply set NONE to hide the welcome message
search_placeholder_text_description: Update the value to change the placeholder text of search bar or set NONE to show default text
search_placeholder_text_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.dz_title}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_title'), or enter NONE (for no DC)
category_block_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of category blocks on homepage
custom_block_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of custom blocks on homepage
additional_custom_block_dc_description: Add placeholder name for Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_additional_custom_block}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_additional_custom_block'), or enter NONE to use specific number of blocks provided in theme
knowledge_base_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of knowledge base tree on homepage
section_category_description: Add category ID for sections to be shown here
block_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of block
block_title_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.dz_title}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_title'), or enter NONE (for no DC)
block_icon_description: Update the value to change the block icon
block_hover_icon_description: Update the value to change the block hover icon
block_font_icon_description: Enter font-awesome class name (e.g. fas fa-pencil-alt), or enter NONE
block_title_description: Update the value to change the title of block or enter 'HIDE_ME' to hide the block
block_url_description: Update the value (URL) to change the redirection of block
block_text_description: Update the value to change the description text of block
sidebar_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of sidebar
comment_block_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of comment block
author_meta_details_visibility_descripti: Update the value to change the visibility of author metadata from Search result, Article Template, Community Post and Community Post List Template
follow_article_description: Users can follow a specific article
follow_border_color_description: Update the value to change the follow button border color
follow_text_color_description: Update the value to change the follow button text-color
follow_text_hover_color_description: Update the value to change the follow button text-color on hover
follow_text_active_color_description: Update the value to change the active follow button text-color
social_share_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of social share icons
articles_in_section_description: Show sidebar of articles in section
table_of_content_description: Update value to change the visibility of table of content
toc_title_description: Update the value to change the title of table of content to be visible in small devices
toc_title_dc_description: Add placeholder text for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.dz_description}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_description'), or enter NONE (for no DC)
toc_description: Update the value to change the TOC to be visible in small devices
follow_section_description: Users can follow a specific section
twitter_link_description: Add link of your twitter profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
facebook_link_description: Add link of your facebook page. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
youtube_link_description: Add link of your youtube channel. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
linkedin_link_description: Add link of your linkedin profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
pinterest_link_description: Add link of your pinterest profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
instagram_link_description: Add link of your instagram profile. To hide this link fill '#' in text box.
sidebar_title_description: Update the value to change the sidebar title on mobile
sidebar_title_description_dc: Add placeholder name for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.dz_title}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_title'), or enter NONE (for no DC)
hide-search-result-sidebar_description: Change value to hide or show search result template sidebar
dc_description: For creating the DC (Dynamic Content) follow this given link in the box
header_link_dc_description: Add Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_header_links_html_dc}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_header_links_html_dc') to use HTML from DC or keep it NONE to use HTML that's hard coded in the header.hbs template. Please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
footerblock_title_description: Update text to change the title of block
footerblock_dc_description: Add placeholder name for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.title}}, add title only), or enter NONE (for no DC)
footerblock_visibility_description: Update value to change the visibility of footer block
footerblock_first_links_dc_description: To add a footer links please visit support.diziana.com for support article
footerblock_second_links_dc_description: To add a footer links please visit support.diziana.com for support article
footerblock_third_links_dc_description: To add a footer links please visit support.diziana.com for support article
footerblock_fourth_links_dc_description: To add a footer links please visit support.diziana.com for support article
foo_blockfirst_link_html_dc_label: Footer First Block Links HTML DC
foo_blocksecond_link_html_dc_label: Footer Second Block Links HTML DC
foo_blockthird_link_html_dc_label: Footer Third Block Links HTML DC
foo_blockfourth_link_html_dc_label: Footer Fourth Block Links HTML DC
foo_blocksecond_links_html_dc_des: Add Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_footer_second_block_links_html_dc}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_footer_second_block_links_html_dc') to use HTML from DC or keep it NONE to use HTML that's hard coded in the footer.hbs template. Please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
foo_blockthird_links_html_dc_des: Add Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_footer_third_block_links_html_dc}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_footer_third_block_links_html_dc') to use HTML from DC or keep it NONE to use HTML that's hard coded in the footer.hbs template. Please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
foo_blockfourth_links_html_dc_des: Add Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_footer_fourth_block_links_html_dc}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_footer_fourth_block_links_html_dc') to use HTML from DC or keep it NONE to use HTML that's hard coded in the footer.hbs template. Please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
footer_block_title_description_dc: Add placeholder name for Dynamic Content (DC) e.g. from {{dc.dz_footer_block_title}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_footer_block_title', or enter NONE (for no DC)
footer_block_title_description: Update the value to change the title of block or type NONE to hide the title
foo_blockfirst_links_html_dc_des: Add Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_footer_first_block_links}},then use placeholder name 'dz_footer_first_block_links') to use HTML from DC or keep it NONE to use html that's coded in the footer.hbs template. Please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
font_color_description: Update the value to change the color of font icon
admonition_block_bg_color_description: Update the value to change the background-color of block
table_border_color_description: Update the value to change the color of table border
table_font_color_description: Update the value to change the color of table font
follow_post_description: Users can follow a specific post
follow_topic_description: Users can follow a specific topic
follow_basic_color_description: Update the value to change the follow button base background-color
follow_hover_color_description: Update the value to change the follow button hover background-color
follow_active_color_description: Update the value to change the active follow button background-color
feature_post_description: User can override the title by typing here or type NONE to show default title or to hide the title leave the box Empty
feature_post_description_dc: Add placeholder text for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.post_title}}, then use placeholder name dz_post_title), or enter NONE (for no DC)
topic_block_icons_description: Add placeholder text for Dynamic Content (DC) for showing icons in the topic blocks (e.g. from {{dc.dz_topic_block_html_icon_dc}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_topic_block_html_icon_dc'), or enter NONE to remove the icon, please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
turn_off_topic_blocks_borders_descriptio: Turns off the border around topic blocks
promoted_article_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of block on homepage
promoted_article_description: User can override the title by typing here or type NONE to show default title
promoted_article_description_dc: Add placeholder text for DC of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.dz_title}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_title'), or enter NONE (for no DC)
article_color_description: Update the value to change the title color
see_more_links_desc: Update the value to change the color of see_more link
article_links_color_desc: Update the value to change the links color
article_vote_visibility_description: Update the value to change the visibility of article vote block
article_helpful_title_description: Update the value to change the article vote block title or type 'NONE' to show default title
article_helpful_title_dc_description: Add placeholder name for Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_article_vote_block_title}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_article_vote_block_title'), or enter NONE (for no DC)
copyright_dc_description: Add Dynamic Content (DC) (e.g. from {{dc.dz_copyright_text}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_copyright_text') to use HTML from DC or keep it NONE to use HTML that's hard coded in the footer.hbs template. Please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
welcome_message_color_description: Update the value to change the welcome message title color
search_button_visibility_description: Update the value to show or hide search button of searchbar
search_block_bg_color_description: Update the value to change the background-color of searchbar
search_placeholder_text_color_descriptio: Update the value to change color of placeholder text
searchbar_text_color_description: Update the value to change the color of searchbar text
inner_searchbar_bg_color_description: Update the value to change the background-color of inner template's searchbar
innersearch_placeholder_color_descriptio: Update the value to change the color of inner template's searchbar placeholder color
innersearchbar_text_color_description: Update the value to change the color of inner template's searchbar text-color
innersearchbar_border_color_description: Update the value to change the color of inner template's searchbar
innersearchbar_icon_color_description: Update the value to change the color of inner template's searchbar icon
knowledgebase_description: User can override the title by typing here or type NONE to show default title or to hide the title leave the box Empty
knowledgebase_description_dc: Add placeholder text for Dynamic Content (DC) of your title here (e.g. from {{dc.dz_knowledgebase_title}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_knowledgebase_title'), or enter NONE (for no DC) to show default title
category_block_icons_description: Add placeholder text for Dynamic Content (DC) for showing icons in the category blocks (e.g. from {{dc.dz_category_block_html_icon_dc}}, then use placeholder name 'dz_category_block_html_icon_dc'), or enter NONE to remove the icon, Please visit our help-center https://support.diziana.com/hc/en-us to learn more about this.
category_block_description_desc: Update the value to change the visibility of category blocks description
show_single_column_label: Show Content On Category And Section In Single Column
show_single_column_description: allows single or double column in content area
kb_tree_in_accordion_label: Enable Accordion For Knowledge Base Tree
home_bg_visibility_desc: Uncheck if you want to show solid color in place of background image.
hero_bg_color_desc: Update the value to change the background-color for homepage banner area
search_button_bg_color_desc: Update the value to change the background-color of search button
search_button_icon_color_desc: Update the value to change the icon color of search button
topic_block_bg_color_desc: Update the value to change the community topics block background color
topic_block_hover_desc: Update the value to change the community topics block background color on hover
topic_block_text_desc: Update the value to change the community topics block text-color
topic_block_hover_text_desc: Update the value to change the community topics block text-color on hover
